name: Save new AmeriCommerce orders to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time a new order is created in AmeriCommerce, Make will automatically add that order to your Google Sheets spreadsheet as a new row. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1TTuVFa6X8l-MldLV2VnYol9lX_YJJrFWGGrZugChv3Q/edit?usp=sharing).
